text.author: Finn Thormeier
text.title: WINE TASTING IN STELLENBOSCH, SOUTH AFRICA | CAPE TOWN VLOG
text.summary: After leaving their home near a beautiful lagoon in South Africa, three friends drive to a wine tasting at a winery, where a sommelier explains about South African wines and serves a cheese platter, with the favorite wines being the white Signature Sauvignon Blanc from Spier and the Creative Block 3, as well as the red Creative Block 5.
